name: Project Magnus Force
description:
In the year 20XX, use of robotic automation has skyrocketed. It has made companies in the business for robots and android systems extremely competitive. An android employed at Stardust has been tasked to infiltrate a PMC development lab based on intel that the competition has made a breakthrough on a new generation of androids.

The protagonist is equipped with programmable balls. They can be thrown as projectiles.

  • roll() - ball will move in a direction, tripping enemies in its way. After rolling, they can be turned into mines by the protagonist.
  • trap() - ball will turn into a trap that will shoot a projectile when triggered.
  • turret() - deployed ball will protrude a gun that shoots at enemy targets.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement keys
  • Left click - Throw ball
  • Right click - Shoot turret
  • Shift - Sprint
  • 1,2,3, - Mode change
